JsonHttpRequestFilter - Class in org.bbqjs.spring.servlet
Wraps a HttpServletRequest in a proxy object which converts the message body into JSON so we can use HttpServletRequest#getParameter in methods that can't take advantage of Jackson message conversion.
JsonHttpRequestFilter() - Constructor for class org.bbqjs.spring.servlet.JsonHttpRequestFilter
 
JsonHttpServletRequest - Class in org.bbqjs.spring.servlet
Wraps a HttpServletRequest that has had it's request body turned into a JSON object.
